title: ParticleFlipbookLayout
content:
This file is automatically generated. Please don't edit it manually.
To submit a bug report on the content, see

name: ParticleFlipbookLayout
type: enum
summary: |
  Determines the layout of the flipbook texture.
description: |
  Determines the layout of the flipbook texture.
codesamples: []
tags: []
deprecationmessage: ''
items:
  - name: None
    summary: |
      Disable flipbook features and use the texture as a single static texture
      over the particle's lifetime.
    value: 0
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: Grid2x2
    summary: |
      2×2 frames for a 4-frame animation.
    value: 1
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: Grid4x4
    summary: |
      4×4 frames for a 16-frame animation.
    value: 2
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: Grid8x8
    summary: |
      8×8 frames for a 64-frame animation.
    value: 3
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: Custom
    summary: |
      A custom grid size defined by
      Class.ParticleEmitter.FlipbookSizeX|FlipbookSizeX and
      Class.ParticleEmitter.FlipbookSizeY|FlipbookSizeY.
    value: 4
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
